ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.multiTermination.impl

Class SumMultiTermination

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.multiTermination.AbstractMultiTermination
      • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.multiTermination.BasicMultiTermination
        • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.multiTermination.impl.SumMultiTermination
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resettable, MultiTermination, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SumMultiTermination
extends BasicMultiTermination

    The Nengo did not have sufficient support of connecting multiple Origins to one Termination. This provides weighted combination (e.g. sum) of multiple inputs to one MultiTermination.

    This is similar to Termination in terms that it represents one input to the Node. It holds list of own Terminations with their weights. The weighted inputs from own Terminations are combined into the resulting value on the MultiTermination.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
